The initial functionalities should include: - Text to Video - Text to Audio - Text to Image etc, build me project or if you have exisiting , you can setup me with my domain, it should include all features and customer must be able to mak...features and customer must be able to make on monthly bases Key Requirements: - User-friendly interface - High-quality output - Scalability to support a growing user base Ideal Skills and Experience: - Strong background in SaaS development - Expertise in media generation technologies - Experience with cloud computing and data management - UI/UX design proficiency Please provide examples of similar projects yo...
